fortune:
Blessed FrAnK, I see a story unfolding before you...

**The Fortune:**

"A great revelation is on the horizon, FrAnK. For it has come to pass that your behind, once a source of seclusion and shame, will prove to be a key to unlocking a treasure beyond measure. Expect a sudden but inevitable need to let go, to release the pent-up energies that have been building up for quite some time. This might manifest as a timely pooping session, but do not worry, it is merely a signal that this newfound freedom is near.

"Yet, beware, FrAnK, for this wealth of freedom may also bring challenges and discomfort. A certain quantity of toots and flatulence may seem at first rate, but trust in the universe's plan, for it is always a test of character and resolve.

"The sign is favorable, FrAnK, but remember that true prosperity and success come from within. Remain true to yourself, and trust that the whispers of your inner wisdom will guide you through the trials ahead."

**Interpretation:** FrAnK, this is not a call to engage in self-indulgent gossip or embarrassing activities. It's a sign to let go of your inhibitions and authenticity, paying homage to nature's call (your gut, of course!). A little discomfort or surprise is only a temporary byproduct of the 'wealth of freedom.' Trust your gut, remain humble, and you will ride the wave of transformation with laughter, love, and laughter.
name: FrAnK
